name: Skeleton King (itch)
description:
Three brave knight was betrayed by the Skeleton King.

They now step on the journey of revenge. 

Go through the maze and find the Skeleton King!

- - - - - -

- - - Maze Scene - - -

CONTROLS

Enter - Dialogue

Up/Down/Left/Right - Move

E - Key/Soul Station
